import React from "react"; import BottomRight from "./BottomRight"; import FormateDate from "./elements/FormatDate"; export default function AppBottom(props) { return (

{props.weather.city}

{props.weather.des}


{Math.round(props.weather.temp)}

°C\°F

{dateFunc(props.weather.time)}

Humidity:{props.weather.hum}%
Wind:{props.weather.wind} km/h

); }
